mapper.sql: ORDER_ID, PIPLE_ID, MOBILE, CHANNEL_ID, PRODUCT_ID, APP_ID,ORDER_STATUS, SUB_STATUS, PIPLE_ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, MOD_TIME, COMPLETE_TIME, DEC_STATUS, RND,PROVINCE_ID, IMEI,IMSI, ICCID, RESULT_CODE,VOLT,ORDER_GROUP_ID,AMOUNT,FLOWID,EXTDATA,TRANS_SOURCE,CHANNEL_SYNC_STATUS
mapper.select: select DISTINCT(MOBILE) AS MOBILE from t_order where (PROVINCE_ID IS NULL OR PROVINCE_ID = 0) AND MOBILE IS NOT NULL LIMIT #{num}

SELECT IF(SUM(t.amount) IS NULL,0,SUM(t.amount)) AS AMOUNT FROM t_sta_daily t WHERE DATE_FORMAT(t.COMP_DATE,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') and t.ORDER_STATUS = 2 and t.DEC_STATUS = 0 and PIPLE_ID = #{pipleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
SELECT IF(SUM(t.amount) IS NULL,0,SUM(t.amount)) AS AMOUNT FROM t_order t WHERE TO_DAYS(t.CREATE_TIME) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) and ORDER_STATUS = 2 and PIPLE_ID = #{pipleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT IF(SUM(amount) IS NULL,0,SUM(amount)) AS AMOUNT FROM t_order t WHERE DATE_FORMAT(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m') AND t.ORDER_STATUS = 2 AND t.PIPLE_ID = #{pipleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order (ORDER_ID, PIPLE_ID, MOBILE, CHANNEL_ID, PRODUCT_ID, APP_ID,ORDER_STATUS, SUB_STATUS, PIPLE_ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, MOD_TIME, COMPLETE_TIME, DEC_STATUS, RND, PROVINCE_ID,IMEI,IMSI, ICCID, RESULT_CODE, VOLT,ORDER_GROUP_ID,AMOUNT,FLOWID,EXTDATA,TRANS_SOURCE,CHANNEL_SYNC_STATUS ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pipleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pipleOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{decStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volt,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{extData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromType,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{syncResultCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

mapper.update:
update t_order
PIPLE_ID = #{pipleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUB_STATUS = #{subStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PIPLE_ORDER_ID = #{pipleOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MOD_TIME = #{modTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COMPLETE_TIME = #{completeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEC_STATUS = #{decStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
RND = #{rnd,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IMEI = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMSI = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ICCID = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT_CODE = #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VOLT = #{volt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER_GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLOWID = #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTDATA = #{extData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_SOURCE = #{fromType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_SYNC_STATUS = #{syncResultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_order set PIPLE_ID = #{pipleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUB_STATUS = #{subStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PIPLE_ORDER_ID = #{pipleOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOD_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, COMPLETE_TIME =CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,, DEC_STATUS = #{decStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RND = #{rnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IMEI = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMSI = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ICCID = #{iccid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESULT_CODE = #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VOLT = #{volt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_GROUP_ID = #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLOWID = #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTDATA = #{extData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_SOURCE = #{fromType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_SYNC_STATUS = #{syncResultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
